reviews.value: Best office compatible chrome app out there. Retains formatting. Works great as a file manager that allows you to move between onedrive, google drive, and onebox. With offline access this would be the killer app.
reviews.author: Jay Borok

reviews.value: Just tried it and it's the next best thing to MS Word. The popular editing functionality works really well especially the copy/paste functionality when pasting into a .gdoc. Opening/converting .docx files is smooth, converted tables are a dream! Far superior than Google docs.
reviews.author: Linda Stansfield

reviews.value: This app works as explained and works much better than having to use docs and convert files over to Word. Everything is formatted just right and all the tools required for editing are there as well. This is a must have if you are a student and need to use Word docx files.
reviews.author: Carlos Navarrete

reviews.value: Seems to easily have the best fidelity for presenting and editing MS Word docs, including complex tables.
reviews.author: Ben Low

reviews.value: Everything I ever expected from an app like this .... Only started a few days ago but for now is just WOW!
reviews.author: Ciprian Ungureanu

reviews.value: Absolutely the best office-like product out there and I've tried a lot. Kept a lot of complicated formatting in place and is tremendously usable. Thanks for this!
reviews.author: Kasey Esposito

reviews.value: Well executed and simple. The same two reason I also love google docs. This just fills in all the gaps google drive leaves out with MS Office files . It's also much better than quickoffice. Seriously, quickoffice is a joke next to this.
reviews.author: Jacob Meyer

reviews.value: Just started using this, but it looks amazing! It even allows comments in Word documents. Great stuff.
reviews.author: David Williamson

reviews.value: Fantastic print quality. As good as Microsoft Office Online. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Daniel Kueh

reviews.value: As good as Microsoft Office. But inside Google Drive!
reviews.author: Andrey Sidorenko

reviews.value: Better than MS Online office suite.
reviews.author: Kabeer Ahmed

reviews.value: Seems to be everything as advertised. Looks good to me. I wonder if the new Google Docs/Slides/Sheets apps functionality will match it. Either way, the user is the winner. Great work!!
reviews.author: Peter Pavlovic

reviews.value: I am not a Microsoft fan, and I can't believe my good fortune in finding this program. I am a personal user, and so far the program meets and exceeds all my needs- Great job!
reviews.author: Frederick Prince

reviews.value: This is by far the best alternative to MS Office that I have used on Chrome.
reviews.author: Benjamin Coate

reviews.value: Best Web editor for Office-Open-XML documents yet.
reviews.author: Sebastian Reuter

reviews.value: First impression is that I don't need any other office-type application and this will do all that I want.
reviews.author: Tony Harvey

reviews.value: This is an outstanding Word processor. It works very well and has many features that large competitors offer. The UI is very easy to navigate. Everything does take a bit to load, but in the end, it's all worth it.
reviews.author: andrewjcole Scratch

reviews.value: Excellent!
reviews.author: Olga Kaczmarczyk

reviews.value: As others have pointed out, it matches the settings of the original document well (something Word Online fails to do) and includes lots of settings that make this operate much more like a real version than a stripped-down web version.
reviews.author: Tim Byers

reviews.value: The best ever editor i have seen.... i was struggling to get an online editor and you saved me BATMAN
reviews.author: Srikar Teratipally

reviews.value: In comparison with Google and Microsoft editors I found that Onlyoffice is a good product and I'd recommend it to my co-workers. Thank you.
reviews.author: Jiro Takayuki

reviews.value: I love the product and its support very much! Every time I have a question or problem i can contact them in different ways (email, talk or even call) and they do their best to find a solution for me!Happy customer.
reviews.author: Марина Фирсова

reviews.value: In terms of this apps ability to create and edit complex Office documents, it far surpasses both Office online and Google's Office Editing extension. It's also the only way to link Google Docs to near flawless Office compatibility, outside a PC/Mac environment. No real speed issues on my Chromebook flip and lets remember guys, THIS IS FREE!
reviews.author: Dave Taylor

reviews.value: This is probably one of the most coole applications I have used since long time. The document editors work like charm within Google drive, and although I am a huge Google fan, I noticed that using Only Office personal presents the documents slightly better when it comes to the docx.exlx etc extensions! Keep it up!! Thanks very much
reviews.author: Denis Steijn

reviews.value: A Good online office functionality with most used features of office suite available for free
reviews.author: Jigar Jadav

reviews.value: This is the best app ever for Chromebook. It has saved me a countless amount of time trying to do things with Google docs and Google sheets only to find out they can't be done. BEST APP EVER for Chromebook!
reviews.author: Barb Barrett

reviews.value: It is not a fake, it is 100% compatible with microsoft office!
reviews.author: Josh Miller

reviews.value: 20/20 no comment best software online for doc etc
reviews.author: Rex Imperial

reviews.value: Great MS compatibility.
reviews.author: Kev M

reviews.value: It is the best!
reviews.author: Сергей Матвеев

reviews.value: Best online office
reviews.author: Dzianis Koshkin

reviews.value: Incredible! The best online office editor. Design fantastic. When you intend display pivot table funcitons?
reviews.author: Mario Alencar

reviews.value: Отличное приложение, 100% замена мелкомягкому офису!
reviews.author: Станислав Савельев

reviews.value: То, что доктор прописал)
reviews.author: Виталий Плитенко

reviews.value: Пожалуй лучший онлайн-редактор
reviews.author: Denis Ozdemir

reviews.value: Отличный сервис. Из всех опробованных сервисов и программ обладает максимальной совместимостью с продуктами Microsoft Office.
reviews.author: Александр Слюсарев

reviews.value: Помимо того, что сервис отличный, он помог мне спасти человека с курсачом :) Сервис пофиксил документ с расширением .docm (стандартная ошибка в макросах Word 2010, не открывает после редактирования) и восстановил пользовательские стили. Всё круто, буду пользоваться в связке с облаком! Спасибо разработчику Андрею за "рекламу" сайта у нас в ДФ ННГУ)
reviews.author: Карина Верба

reviews.value: Всё хорошо. Во время учебы пришлось искать облачный офис и выбор пал на OOP. За пару лет работы с ним сильных нареканий не возникало. Функциями и работой доволен. Порадовало так же, что в подключенных аккаунтах появился яндекс диск.
reviews.author: Анатолий Ашулин

reviews.value: Лучший "облачный офис", что мне когда-либо попадался. Но вот личное пожелание, добавьте возможность добавлять автособираемое оглавление.
reviews.author: Илья Расторгуев

reviews.value: Отличный сервис.
reviews.author: Дмитрий Маликов

reviews.value: Отлично!
reviews.author: Виталий Койструб

reviews.value: Понравилось. Твердая 5+
reviews.author: Sergey Strelnikov

reviews.value: Es la mejor webapp para editar texto mejor que Documents de Drive y mucho mejor que Word de Web office. Un saludo y espero sigan mucho tiempo así
reviews.author: SaJu CeLo

reviews.value: Excelente aplicación. Sincroniza a la perfección con mi dropbox
reviews.author: Emanuel Rodriguez

reviews.value: Excelente aplicación, fácil de usar y gran compatibilidad !!!
reviews.author: Samuel Valderrama Martínez

reviews.value: Al fin encontré una buena app para abrir mis documentos en linea.. :) .. Gracias!!
reviews.author: Angie Benitez Serofani

reviews.value: Es buenisimo para las cromebook 5 estrellas
reviews.author: Luis chuta

reviews.value: es buenísima...lo recomiendo...
reviews.author: Omar Gallardo

reviews.value: Funciona muy bien!!
reviews.author: Alonso Cardona Pereira

reviews.value: Una maravilla... Lo recomiendo!!!
reviews.author: Jon Cortes

reviews.value: Me encanta! Excelente!
reviews.author: Mauricio Oscar Alberto Piaggi

reviews.value: Excelente aplicación en la nube. La mejor para editar archivos de office.
reviews.author: Pedro Vilanova

reviews.value: Excelente aplicación, es lo mas parecido a la suite de ofimatica de Microsoft que he podido encontrar
reviews.author: Alexis Ascui

reviews.value: La verdad, me ha sorprendido lo completa que que es y lo bien que funciona
reviews.author: Fernando Ros

reviews.value: excelente, funcional, rápida y muy completa
reviews.author: Joe Merengue

reviews.value: Es de gran ayuda y soporte, Gracias.
reviews.author: Jose Juan Zermeño Garza

reviews.value: Genial
reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Arjona Tamayo

reviews.value: Très bonne application. A utiliser sans réserve. Un plus, la connexion avec vos autres applications (dropbox...)
reviews.author: Jean-Luc Plavis

reviews.value: Très bonne application pour traiter ses fichiers en ligne.
reviews.author: Franck Emile Kouassi

reviews.value: Bien pensée, bien faite, très intéressante la connexion avec les autres plateformes (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive ...). En espérant des améliorations notables dans l'avenir.
reviews.author: Eric Genestine

reviews.value: Accessibilité aux fonctions vraiment très simple mais l'interface n'est pas très jolie mais ca fait l'affaire
reviews.author: kenneth nitcheu

reviews.value: Utile pour ma part et bonne appréciation Continuez ....
reviews.author: Arnaud D

reviews.value: C'est pour ma part le meilleur ... 5 étoiles le jour ou cette application fonctionnera hors ligne ! Trés bien ... Merci
reviews.author: Hervé COURTOIS

reviews.value: Vorher bin ich Nutzer eines Notebooks mit Windows gewesen und bin auf ein Chromebook umgestiegen und die App ist so ziemlich die beste Alternative gegenüber Microsoft Office und man kann sogar seine Sprache auswählen.
reviews.author: Clemens Torno

reviews.value: Gute Sache das! Bearbeitung leicht, schnell und intuitiv. Große Auswahl bei Cloud-Drives. Sehr empfehlenswert.
reviews.author: Bert Beck

reviews.value: SEHR BRAUCHBAR
reviews.author: R. S.

reviews.value: Muito bom, vários recursos que outras ferramentas office online deixam a desejar! Nota 10!
reviews.author: Marcelo Trindade
